review: Dr. L Revathi mam was very friendly explanation also very clear and suggestion also perfectly explain  for me. Too good Revathi mam. Thank u mam

Very friendly doctor and she have a lots of patience.
The way of explaining and communicating, is very good.

Dr.Revathi garu - I know maam since 10years, i was suffering from PCOD for very longtime, i reached out to other doctors after my marriage for PCOD but there was no improvement and they said u  cannot concieve also, but when i reachedout to maam after my sister suggestion and maam gave good treatment,few medicines and also recommened good diet and maam also speaks very friendly ,you can clear your doudts without any hesitation.Now i am having 2yr old kid and i definetly suggest to consult madam and also suggested my friends and they too have succesful stories like me who has lost hopes.

Thank you maam.
She was good understanding the problem and also provided good medication she is available on the phone

I had booked appointment for my family member and visited Vijaya Nursing Home. Dr. L Revathi was very friendly and polite with us, we had received positive response from the doctor and we are completely satisfied by there. I would like to recommend this doctor for other also.  Coming to the hospital, the staff were rude with the patient which we did not like it and we had waited more than 1 hour for my appointment.

My first pregnancy was looked after by her. It's after 8 years that I searched for her and reapproached her. I hope every one can understand when I say I searched for her, how reliable and responsible doctor she is. My words say everything about her.
